com.sudoplay.axion.stream

Interface StreamCompressionWrapper


  • public interface StreamCompressionWrapper
    The StreamCompressionWrapper is an interface to create wrappers responsible for wrapping the given InputStream or OutputStream with a compression stream.

    Implementations of this interface should contain no state.

    Author:
    Jason Taylor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static StreamCompressionWrapper DEFLATER_STREAM_COMPRESSION_WRAPPER
      Wraps the given streams in an InflaterInputStream or a DeflaterOutputStream.
      static StreamCompressionWrapper GZIP_STREAM_COMPRESSION_WRAPPER
      Wraps the given streams in a GZIPInputStream or GZIPOutputStream.
      static StreamCompressionWrapper PASSTHROUGH_STREAM_COMPRESSION_WRAPPER
      Performs no wrapping; simply passes the given stream through.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStream wrap(java.io.InputStream inputStream) 
      java.io.OutputStream wrap(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
